subject: World Series
Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Shane Victorino’s seventh-inning grand slam carried the Red Sox past the Tigers in Game 6 of the A.L.C.S. and into the World Series, where they will face the Cardinals.
snippet: Shane Victorino’s seventh-inning grand slam carried the Red Sox past the Tigers in Game 6 of the A.L.C.S. and into the World Series, where they will face the Cardinals.
